signature.instructions: Match a taxonomy page to the most relevant content page with rubric scoring.

fields.description: List of available content pages with index, title, URL, and preview
Brief explanation of why this decision was chosen
Index of the best matching content page, or -1 if no good match
Topical alignment score 0-1 (coverage of taxonomy topic)
Intent alignment score 0-1 (does the content's purpose match taxonomy intent)
Named entity/keyword overlap score 0-1 (0 if none are present)
Temporal relevance score 0-1 (use 0 if not applicable)
